path.style: stroke: #3E8ED0; stroke-width: 25; fill: none; transform: translate(30px, 170px); transform-origin: 50% 50%;
stroke: #CE7A34; stroke-width: 25; fill: none; transform: rotate(180deg) translate(30px, 170px); transform-origin: 50% 50%;

line.style: stroke: #868482; stroke-width: 7; fill: none; transform: translate(-30px, -30px);
